name: CamectHome
0:
”Alexa, ask Camect Home to view camera front yard”
”Alexa, tell Camect Home to view camera driveway at eleven am”
”Alexa, tell Camect home to play latest alert”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: camect home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to view video, footage, and alerts from all of the security cameras you use with your Camect Home hub. Never heard of Camect? See https://camect.com to learn more.
From an Alexa device that has a display (e.g. Echo) you can view a camera live, view footage at a specific time, view time-lapses, and even view footage based on objects (e.g. people, cars, UPS, etc) detected. For example, if you have a camera named "driveway", try "View people from camera 'driveway' for the one hour starting from 11am." !
